summary: This document contains a certificate of limited liability company resolutions for Southern Financial, LLC, authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts. It lists authorized signers, including Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke, and outlines the powers granted to them regarding the management of the company's accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for Southern Financial, LLC, with the authority to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Indyke is also listed as an authorized signer for Southern Financial, LLC, alongside Epstein.

connections.description: Both Epstein and Indyke are authorized signers for Southern Financial, LLC, indicating a close working relationship.

keyFacts: The document certifies the resolutions of Southern Financial, LLC, authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage its accounts.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke are named as authorized signers for the company.
The document outlines the powers granted to the authorized signers regarding account management.
It states that no one other than the company has any interest in the accounts opened in the company's name.
The resolutions have not been modified or amended since the date shown in the document.
